docs.title: Helical AI Docs
docs.text: Welcome. Use the navigation to explore.

docs.title: Helical AI Overview
docs.text: A complete, organized, and repeatable way to capture math, code, experiments, IP, and publication for the Helical and Architect blend.

docs.title: Purpose
docs.text: Define the mathematical core used for state updates.

docs.title: Definitions
docs.text:
• Projection: \(X_t = W_x H_{t-1} + b_x\)
  • Reception: \(Y_t = W_y I_t + b_y\)
  • Base (error): \(b_t = (Y_t - X_t)/2\)
  • Neutral (geometric mean): \(a_t = \exp(0.5(\ln(|X_t|+\epsilon)+\ln(|Y_t|+\epsilon)))\)
  • Carrier (arithmetic mean): \(c_t = (Y_t + X_t)/2\)

docs.title: Rotation / Phase
docs.text:
• Phase increment: \(\Delta \phi_t \in \{5,7,11,13\}\times 2\pi/24\), or learned variant.
  • Rotation operator: define block-rotations or unitary update here.

docs.title: Update Rule
docs.text: State proposal: \(z_t = f([b_t,a_t,c_t])\). Final: \(H_t = g( R_{\Delta \phi_t}(z_t), H_{t-1})\).

docs.title: Coherence Objective
docs.text: \(\mathcal{L}_{coh} = \mathbb{E}[gate(b_t)\cdot (1-\cos(H_{t-1},H_t))]\)

docs.title: Phase and Rotation Schedule
docs.text:
• Quasi-prime wheel: steps = [5,7,11,13] over 24.
  • Learned offset: small MLP of \(\|b_t\|, \|a_t\|, \|c_t\|\).
  • Alternatives: sinusoidal, Sobol or Halton discretizations.
  • Justification: non-aliasing and long horizon recall.

docs.title: Constructor
docs.text: HelicalCell(dim, phase_mode="qprime|learned", coherence_lambda=0.0, ...)

docs.title: forward(H_{t-1}, I_t) -> H_t, aux
docs.text: • aux: {phi, dphi, stats}

docs.title: Training Hooks
docs.text: • coherence_loss(h_prev, h_curr, b_t)

docs.title: Interfaces
docs.text:
• Inputs: H_{t-1}, I_t
  • Outputs: H_t, Aux (phase, stats)

docs.title: Blocks
docs.text:
• Triangle kernel
  • Rotation or phase module
  • RMSNorm with residual pathway
  • Optional attention phase-gate

docs.title: Variants
docs.text:
• Orthogonal (Cayley or Householder)
  • Power-mean fusion (learn p)
  • KV ring buffer keyed by phase

docs.title: Bench Setup
docs.text:
• Tasks: copy, reverse, parity. Needle in a haystack. MIDI continuation. Tiny LM.
  • Metrics: horizon length, phase slip rate, perplexity or accuracy.
  • Ablations: Δφ schedule. λ schedule. Rotation type. Head mixing.

docs.title: Engineering Notes
docs.text:
• Vectorization for rotations
  • Log-domain geometric mean for stability
  • Mixed precision notes
  • torch.compile notes

docs.title: Experiment Logs
docs.text: Add entries like experiment-YYYYMMDD-<slug>.md for every run. - 2025-08-24 — toy next-step prediction

docs.title: Ablation Plan
docs.text:
• Δφ: qprime vs sinusoid vs learned
  • Rotation: block Givens vs Cayley vs unitary
  • Fusion: AM or GM vs power mean
  • Coherence: λ in {0, .01, .05}
  • Attention: off vs phase gated vs hybrid head

docs.title: Goal
docs.text: Sanity-check HelicalCell v1 on a periodic signal.

docs.title: Config
docs.text: • dim=32, epochs=3, Adam lr=3e-3

docs.title: Results
docs.text: • Loss decreased across epochs on periodic synthetic data.

docs.title: Observations
docs.text: • Training runs without errors; helical rotation + triangle-fusion is numerically stable at this scale.

docs.title: Next
docs.text:
• Add copy/reverse/parity benchmarks.
  • Try learned-phase Δφ and compare vs fixed.

docs.title: Dataset Cards
docs.text: Document sources, licenses, splits, preprocessing, risks.
